input.sentences: today i am making crab bisque for the first time .
first i took all of the meat from inside of the crab .
next i put in chicken stock | pasta sauce | white wine and pasta .
i added the crab and scallions and let it simmer for a bit .
i think that a did a wonderful job cooking crab bisque .
output.sentences: It takes time to make a good crab bisque.
You have to remove the meat inside the crab.
A good white wine is good to add to the soup stock.
Simmer the scallions and crab in the soup stock.
It might be a job to make this crab bisque but it tastes wonderful.
